test-set.name: iterate
test-set.description: Tests the xsl:iterate instruction introduced in XSLT 3.0

test-case.name: iterate-001
test-case.description: Basic Test of xsl:iterate instruction, including position() and last().

result.assert-xml: <out><item position="1" last="6"><TITLE>Pride and Prejudice</TITLE></item ><item position="2" last="6"><TITLE>Wuthering Heights</TITLE></item ><item position="3" last="6"><TITLE>Tess of the d'Urbervilles</TITLE></item ><item position="4" last="6"><TITLE>Jude the Obscure</TITLE></item ><item position="5" last="6"><TITLE>The Big Over Easy</TITLE></item ><item position="6" last="6"><TITLE>The Eyre Affair</TITLE></item ></out>

test-case.name: iterate-002
test-case.description: Test of xsl:iterate instruction setting a parameter with xsl:next-iteration

result.assert-xml: <out><item cost="0"><TITLE>Pride and Prejudice</TITLE></item ><item cost="4.95"><TITLE>Wuthering Heights</TITLE></item ><item cost="11.53"><TITLE>Tess of the d'Urbervilles</TITLE></item ><item cost="16.48"><TITLE>Jude the Obscure</TITLE></item ><item cost="21.43"><TITLE>The Big Over Easy</TITLE></item ><item cost="37.9"><TITLE>The Eyre Affair</TITLE></item ></out>

test-case.name: iterate-003
test-case.description: Test of xsl:iterate instruction with early exit using xsl:break

result.assert-xml: <out><item cost="0"><TITLE>Pride and Prejudice</TITLE></item ><item cost="4.95"><TITLE>Wuthering Heights</TITLE></item ><item cost="11.53"><TITLE>Tess of the d'Urbervilles</TITLE></item ></out>

test-case.name: iterate-004
test-case.description: Basic Test of xsl:iterate instruction showing it accepts xsl:fallback.

result.assert-xml: <out><item position="1" last="6"><TITLE>Pride and Prejudice</TITLE></item ><item position="2" last="6"><TITLE>Wuthering Heights</TITLE></item ><item position="3" last="6"><TITLE>Tess of the d'Urbervilles</TITLE></item ><item position="4" last="6"><TITLE>Jude the Obscure</TITLE></item ><item position="5" last="6"><TITLE>The Big Over Easy</TITLE></item ><item position="6" last="6"><TITLE>The Eyre Affair</TITLE></item ></out>

test-case.name: iterate-006
test-case.description: Basic Test of xsl:iterate instruction. Error, xsl:next-iteration must be lexically within xsl:iterate

test-case.name: iterate-007
test-case.description: Basic Test of xsl:iterate instruction. Error, xsl:break must be lexically within xsl:iterate

test-case.name: iterate-008
test-case.description: Basic Test of xsl:iterate instruction. Error, xsl:next-iteration must come last

test-case.name: iterate-009
test-case.description: Basic Test of xsl:iterate instruction. Error, xsl:break must come last

modified.change: Changed to specific error code XTSE3120 for xsl:iterate instruction.

test-case.name: iterate-010
test-case.description: Basic Test of xsl:iterate instruction. Error, xsl:break within a literal result element

modified.change: Changed to specific error code XTSE3120 for xsl:iterate instruction.

test-case.name: iterate-011
test-case.description: Basic Test of xsl:iterate instruction. Error, xsl:break within xsl:for-each

modified.change: Changed to specific error code XTSE3120 for xsl:iterate instruction.

test-case.name: iterate-012
test-case.description: Basic Test of xsl:iterate instruction. Error, two xsl:param elements with same name

test-case.name: iterate-013
test-case.description: Basic Test of xsl:iterate instruction. Error, two xsl:with-param elements with same name

test-case.name: iterate-014
test-case.description: Basic Test of xsl:iterate instruction, uses variables.

test-case.name: iterate-015
test-case.description: Basic Test of xsl:iterate instruction, uses variables and early exit.

test-case.name: iterate-016
test-case.description: Basic test of xsl:iterate; exercises xsl:on-completion and implicit continuation

test-case.name: iterate-017
test-case.description: Basic test of xsl:iterate; params not given a value retain their previous value

test-case.name: iterate-018
test-case.description: Basic test of xsl:iterate; params not given a value retain their previous value, even when shadowed by a local variable

test-case.name: iterate-019
test-case.description: Basic test of xsl:iterate; xsl:break contains a sequence constructor

test-case.name: iterate-020
test-case.description: Basic test of xsl:iterate; ensure params evaluated with correct context

test-case.name: iterate-021
test-case.description: Basic test of xsl:iterate; ensure with-param evaluated with old values of params, unaffected by other with-param elements

test-case.name: iterate-022
test-case.description: Basic Test of xsl:iterate instruction. Error, two xsl:with-param elements with same name

modified.change: XTSE3130 (specific to xsl:iterate) instead of XTSE0680.

test-case.name: iterate-023
test-case.description: xsl:on-completion is in the wrong place

test-case.name: iterate-024
test-case.description: xsl:on-completion is in the wrong place

test-case.name: iterate-025
test-case.description: context item is undefined within xsl:on-completion

test-case.name: iterate-026
test-case.description: context position is undefined within xsl:on-completion

test-case.name: iterate-027
test-case.description: processing using xsl:iterate - group adjacent transactions by date. Same as serial017 but not streamed

test-case.name: iterate-028
test-case.description: Basic test of xsl:iterate; xsl:break contains a select attribute

test-case.name: iterate-029
test-case.description: error, xsl:break contains a select attribute and a sequence constructor

test-case.name: iterate-030
test-case.description: xsl:on-completion with a select attribute

test-case.name: iterate-031
test-case.description: error, xsl:on-completion with a select attribute and content

test-case.name: iterate-032
test-case.description: xsl:on-completion refers to a local variable: see bug 24179

test-case.name: iterate-033
test-case.description: Initial value of parameter is an empty sequence

test-case.name: iterate-034
test-case.description: Nested xsl:iterate instructions

result.assert-xml: <out><day date="2015-01-01" days.left="5"/><day date="2015-01-02" days.left="4" /><day date="2015-01-03" days.left="3"/><day date="2015-01-04" days.left="2" /><day date="2015-01-05" days.left="1"/><day date="2015-01-06" days.left="0"/></out>

test-case.name: iterate-035
test-case.description: xsl:break within xsl:try.

test-case.name: iterate-036
test-case.description: xsl:break within xsl:catch.

test-case.name: iterate-037
test-case.description: Absent focus within xsl:on-completion

test-case.name: iterate-038
test-case.description: Variable inlining into xsl:on-completion - Saxon bug 3243

test-case.name: iterate-039
test-case.description: Function conversion rules apply to xsl:iterate/xsl:with-param/@as

test-case.name: iterate-040
test-case.description: Use on-completion with a singleton iteration and empty body (Saxon bug 4542)

test-case.name: iterate-041
test-case.description: Use on-completion with statically empty select expression (Saxon bug 4542)

test-case.name: iterate-042
test-case.description: Supplied parameter value for xsl:with-param is atomized where necessary (Saxon bug 4541)

test-case.name: iterate-043
test-case.description: Local variable with same name as parameter (Saxon bug 5190)

test-case.name: iterate-901
test-case.description: Basic Test of xsl:iterate instruction. Error, xsl:param must come first

test-case.name: iterate-902
test-case.description: Error, xsl:param must have a valid initial value. See spec bug 25158.
